tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
body:
Crimes of Grindewald

So I saw it last night and it wasn’t at all what I expected, there were many flaws and and I have many, many questions but I loved it. Seeing Hogwarts on the big screen again felt so emotional and made me feel as excited as the 14 year old me who last saw Hogwarts in the cinema. It was funny and sweet, dark and intriguing, and most of all magical. The perfect sequel and the worst - after all of the twists, turns, and surprises I don’t how we are supposed to wait for the next instalment!?!

tags: honestly this has ruined harry potter for me
summary: To all those people who keep saying the book/manga is better.
body:
To all those people who keep saying the book/manga is better.

I understand why someone would prefer reading the book/manga, I really do! It’s just that not everyone has time for it, a chapter of manga takes me a good hour to read while an anime episode takes about 30min. Same for regular book and movies, a Harry Potter book, for example, takes me a good week or more to read while the movie takes about 2-3 hours.

I’m a slow reader, and so are many people I know. Plus, some are dyslectic.

Furthermore, as someone with aphantasia (the inabilty to form an image in your head) movies give me a better experience, since all the visualisation is already done. The (voice-)acting makes it a much more enjoyable experience for me too.


I’m just trying to say that movies/anime have their positives too. I’m getting quite tired of people badgering me saying the book is better or the manga is superiour to the anime. Especially the elitists get on my nerves.

In short: let people enjoy fiction the way they want

summary:
Albus: Severus, what if we put young Draco on the Slytherin quidditch team?
Severus: He didn't try out
Albus: But then we'd have...
body:
Albus: Severus, what if we put young Draco on the Slytherin quidditch team?
Severus: He didn't try out
Albus: But then we'd have him and Harry as quidditch rivals. It'd be perfect to build their love story!

summary: rules • canons • app • first link • link back In this alternate universe, Lord Voldemort is dead, but so is Harry Potter....
caption:
rules • canons • app • first link • link back

In this alternate universe, Lord Voldemort is dead, but so is Harry Potter. Factions continue to fight, Hogwarts educates the next generation of witches and wizards, and the Ministry of Magic does its best to hold everything together.

blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: I was in the Library with my friend yesterday
body:
I was in the Library with my friend yesterday

and the Librarian came over and was all like “everyone else is quiet, and all i can hear is your voices” and he heavily infferred that we should gtfo but he never said “you guys need to go.” So I was packing and getting ready to leave but my friend wanted to stay and i was all like “no we should leave like i dont wanna fight, it’s not a big deal and not worth the fuss” and she said to me “that’s the difference between you and I. When an authority figure tells you to do something you just do it, me, i look for the loophole and try to get out of it” and if that isnt confirmation that she’s a slytherin and im a hufflepuff idk what is
